title: For Big Miners, U.S. Workers Are Most Reluctant to Get Vaccinated
sub_head: Mining companies operate in some of the world’s least developed countries, yet have their lowest Covid-19 vaccination rates at U.S. sites
body:
In their race to vaccinate staff against Covid-19, America’s largest miners struggle most in one country: the U.S.
Mining companies operate in some of the least developed countries on the planet, but it is in the world’s richest nation where they are finding it hardest to persuade staff to get vaccinated.
